setup: Flip a coin to see who goes first
Playing deck is 32 Cards with no duplicates
turnStructure: Players gain 3 PT every turn (increases by 1 each turn, max 10 PT/turn)
Players cannot attack their first turn
gameplay: Each player starts with 25 PHP (Player HP)
Goal is to make the enemy's PHP = 0
You cannot damage the player if units are on board, unless stated otherwise
Units cannot exceed one equipment, unless stated otherwise
If an object is both land and another card type, it can be played only as a land
specialRules: If a number has a decimal, round up
Making a noise is defined as a card requiring to say something
No curse words (as defined by Wiktionary)
No sexual comments (as defined by EEOC)
